title: The Ultimate Cigar Book
author: Richard Carleton Hacker
review: It is a very premium book! It kinda reminds me a high school textbook. The paper used in the pages feels like glossy paper. The hardcover version feels really nice and I enjoy reading this one.

title: Tech Deck: Shred It!
author: Rebecca Shapiro
review: The content is pretty much the same as the first official guidebook. Makes them a pair of good collectibles.

title: Tech Deck: Official Guide
author: Rebecca Shapiro
review: It comes with a tech deck fingerboard, a small book about some skate basics and techniques, and a buildable hard paper ramp.
